blog.name: folktalesofexandria
blog.title: Folk . Tales . of . Exandria
blog.description:
You've heard it from the Cobalt Soul archivists. Now hear it from the wandering bards of Exandria...

-

The official tumblr of the unofficial Critical Role fanfiction zine, organised by @sparxwrites and @notalwaysweak.

summary: Update - Timeline and Distribution
title: Update - Timeline and Distribution
body:
Just a little update on how things are going, folks!

First, a revised timeline:

  • January 10th - Writer sign-ups open!
  • January 31st - Writer sign-ups close at 11:59 UTC.
  • February 2nd/3rd - Writers hear back about whether they’ve been selected or not (please note this deadline is tentative).
  • February 14th - Deadline for writers having submitted a fic proposal.
  • March 28th - First drafts due (to ensure everyone’s on track, and to catch any major issues early).
  • April 28th - Final drafts due!

The first draft and final draft deadlines have been pushed forward a week and a week-and-a-half respectively. Our fantastic crew of bards have now all been set to writing, and believe me, there’s going to be some fantastic stuff coming out of this.

Second, we’re very sorry to announce that we’re no longer going to be able to do a print copy of the zine. We very badly wanted to, because physical things are cool and books are even cooler - but unfortunately, we have information now that we didn’t when we started this project (specifically, regarding previous attempts at CR art zines and issues they’ve run into) that means it’s just not possible any more. We’ve been unable to contact anyone on the CR team to talk to about this, and we’re not willing to risk ourselves, our writers, or the zine with regards to copyright and legal issues. We hope you all understand!

The zine is, however, categorically still going ahead, and just because we’re not doing a book you can touch doesn’t mean we’re not doing a book! The new release plan is a free ebook pdf (exact distribution route coming soon), which will still be done up with all the graphics bells and whistles you’d expect from a zine. It will be a physical copy in everything but… well, physicality. (So, really, a physical copy in spirit.)

We are (very tentatively) expecting a release date of mid-May for the zine. Mark your calendars! And thank you for your enthusiasm and continued support. <3

summary: this blog not spoiler free!!
body:
this blog not spoiler free!!

so if you get butthurt by spoilers please yeet yourself or block tags my dudes. I’m talking the adventure zone and critical role for the most part.

if its a spoiler I tag critical role with #cr spoilers and #critical role spoilers so block those. I generally dont tag taz??? I can though??? but I need feedback if y'all want me to or not tbh

summary: The end of the month approaches - is...tomorrow, in fact - so I’m posting again to state my Ko-fi commissions remain open! It’s...
caption:
The end of the month approaches - is…tomorrow, in fact - so I’m posting again to state my Ko-fi commissions remain open! It’s going to be another really small paycheck, and though there has been some progress in job searching, if said progress bears fruit I will need money for public transport and lunches!

Any contribution will get you a little word art - above are examples of what they tend to come out looking like - if you give me a quote or character name! 

I am also doing little character head shots, like the one above! I’d say they’d cost 3 coffees a go - which comes to £9/around ten dollars, I think? - unless you want a Whole Lot of Detail/embellishments/other miscellaneous bits and pieces that would make it extra complicated.

Any and every little means the absolute world.

TL;DR

1 Coffee - A Basic Word Art of your choice, hand-drawn and posted unless you’d prefer it done digitally

3 Coffees - Character Head Shot

Fandoms I’m Currently Knee-Deep In And Would Love To Do Art For;

Kingdom Hearts

Dungeons and Dragons

Critical Role

The Foxhole Court

Miscellaneous Kpop

My Ko-fi
